content.detailedDescription:
I briefly stopped back at my house to check on my wife as she was not feeling well. i was on break from work (i work and live in the same town, just a few minutes away.) i arrived home about 4:00 am. it was a clear moonless night, and also it was the peak of the persied meteor shower. i had seen one (meteor) on the drive home. before going inside i scanned the sky once more, and saw a second meteor and a bonus sighting of a satellite moving roughly west to east. i then went inside, checked on my wife, and then went out to my car to head back to work. as i descended the outside steps, i walked a few feet to where my car was parked, and looked up again to see if i could see anymore meteors, when a very bright "star" caught my eye. the "star" was to my northeast at about a 45 deg. angle above the horizon. it was easily as bright as venus, though not as bright as jupiter. it was not scintillating at all like a star would do. i thought that it was venus i was looking at, until i quickly realized that venus was not in this part of the sky at this time of year. it was at that moment that a very remarkable thing happened. it slowly faded out and disappeared. like a candle being blown out, (after the flame goes out, and you get that orange glow before it fades out completely.) the whole sighting could not have lasted more than about 15 seconds or so. but as it was fading out, my thought was that it was an airplane going behind a cloud. so i just stared at the area, and waited for the "plane" to re-appear. it never did. but then i also realized that there wasn't a cloud in the sky at the time! you have to understand something. i am an amateur astronomer, and weather observer. i have been scanning the sky for decades. i have seen a lot of remarkable things, but never anything like this. if there is a rational explanation for what i saw, believe me, i would love to hear it. my head may be in the clouds, but my feet are planted firmly on the ground. i am really curious to know if anyone else reported anything unusual in my area that night. 

thank you for taking my report.

sincerely,

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Observed what i thought was a bright star, when suddenly it slowly winked out.

content.detailedDescription:
1.	where were you and what were you doing at the time?

sitting on my front porch at the address above enjoying the evening and chatting with my tenant over a cocktail. i was looking around at the property and the sky (i always keep my eyes on the skies)

2. what made you first notice the object?

i was looking south at the sky past some trees and a power line and i spotted the object in the sky moving right to left just above one of my neighbour’s trees.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

i thought it was a conventional aircraft

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

object spotted at approximately 19:45:30. at first glance i thought it was a conventional aircraft as it was flying straight and level at typical aircraft speed. what appeared to be a white very high aspect ratio arched wing was visible at the bottom, with two light greyish coloured fuzzy patches above which i took to be reflections off of twin high wing engines. no engine noise heard. i could not see a fuselage nor tail structure but did not think much of it immediately as it is common to see light planes and helicopters in the area.

object was moving approx west to east at maybe 1500 foot altitude at perhaps 115 knots (typical small aircraft speed, approx 1000 m due south of my house. visibility good, sky clear and a rain squall had moved east of the area about 1 hour before.

clear sky light breeze from the north. weather records from kingston airport (ygk) show 7 km/hr from 320 deg at 2000 hrs that day.

i jokingly said to my friend t sitting on the porch as well ‘hey, that might be a ufo’ and she leaped up and snapped a photo of it with her iphone (model 5s) and immediately emailed it to me. 

‘do you really think so?’ she asked and i said ‘i doubt it, perhaps it could possibly be a high winged twin engine flying boat of some kind. (ie engines mounted above the wing)’. 

before it disappeared to the east behind some trees, its path started to descend slightly in a smooth curve, which struck me as odd.

it is interesting since we have been discussing the subject over previous days as i am an accredited mufon field investigator, a former mufon country representative for hong kong. 


5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

feelings of mild curiosity, which increased substantially after i examined t’s photo the following day. 

at the time of teh sighting, i activated the flight tracker app on my samsung smart phone and determined there were three commercial flights at high altitude within about a 20 mile radius. unfortunately i did not record a screenshot.

my curiosity increased when i looked at the photo the following day. there was no sign of the white wing, nor any tail or fuselage. 

i therefore decided to investigate a bit. 

i contacted (unofficially) aviation sources who were also curious and kindly gave me flight  movement records of local flight movements in the area. 

there were five flight movements recorded in the time frame:

18:05 hrs cessna citation 750
19:56 hours beech 1900 
20:21 hours cessna 172
20:36 hours cessna 172
20:40 hours beech 1900

my source was not able to specify what the flight movements were – i understand they could be takeoffs, landings or transits of the local control zone. checking schedules the two movements of the beech 1900 were clearly the arrival of the scheduled toronto – kingston air georgian  flight and its subsequent departure back to toronto.  the two cessna 172 movements were likely a short training flight from the local flying club. the citation could be a landing, takeoff or (unlikely) a low level transit through the air control zone. it is outside the time frame as are the c 172’s.

i considered whether the sighting could have been the inbound yyz - ygk air georgian flight and find that extremely unlikely. i have taken that flight many times myself and it invariably does a straight in approach to either runway 07-25 or a single turn approach onto final onto runway 01-19 (depending on the wind direction). 

since the area of the sighting is 14 km east of the airport, even if they had been using runway 25 they would not have got that far east of the airport. as the wind was recorded at 320 degrees i expect they used runway 01,  turning straight in onto final from the yyz – ygk course of about 090.

i will be following up to try to obtain official records and may consider contacting air georgian.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

see above. object was obscured by trees.
content.summary: Uap high aspect ratio white crescent wing with two fuzzy appendages above, no tail or fuselage, moving west to east then curving slight descent

content.detailedDescription: Driving between spalding , lincolnshire , uk and gosberton , lincolnshire , uk i observed two lights rotating clockwise around each other flying at great speed out of the window of my car , i was so amazed by this sight of agility i stopped in a lay-by to watch the display , the lights seemed to move at phenomenal speed always rotating around each other but moving freely about the night sky , stopping in places for a few seconds then darting off to another point , this went on for 7 or 8 minutes then quicker than anything i have ever witnessed before the ascended into the inky blackness and vanished , there were a few cars that had pulled over to watch this but nobody i knew , i then went home and told the family about it and thought of more of it until encouraged by a friend to report it to you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two bright rotating lights

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were out at what was to be the best time to see the meteor shower. being a photographer i have a canon 60d and was using a lens 50mm f1.4 and am able to clearly capture stars. as it was approaching 4 and we were getting ready to go in i was looking at the many stars that appear as pairs. i have always found them out of place so admiring them was not uncommon. as all of a sudden the pair of stars i was looking at one of the just look like it took off. i was so shocked i couldn't speak i hit record on my camera which was already facing in that direction because the meteors were supposed to be coming from the north east. i have actually seen with my boyfriend on multiple occasions objects moving seamlessly across the sky, only this time i saw the beginning it was a star, it was stationary for a very long time i have had that duo of stars in past night pictures i have taken but this time i had my camera ready. and filmed this object move clear across the night sky until it vanished. we're in still in shock. and i would like to add that i did not enhance this video in any way.
content.summary: A star i was observing started to move in a straight path readyacross the sky

content.detailedDescription:
It had been raining heavily for a number of days.  we lived in a farm with a old quarry behind the house on the property.
we were sleeping on a mattress on the floor.  it was late at night.  i don't know it it was the hum (which felt internal) or the rectangular shape that got larger and came in through the window that woke me.  the rectangle was comprised of moving bars of light that pulsed toward the center of the object.
i sat up  from the floor mattress and i know this sounds crazy, but in my mind i was swearing a blue streak, somehow yelling with my mind that i would remember this and i was calling whatever the coldness was every name in the book.
i woke my husband and he sat up for a second and i know this sounds nuts but then he lay back down.  
i was terrified and i forced myself to look at the lights swearing in my mind the whole time.  the lights ended with me seeing what one would see if you were flashed by a bright camera, but in this case colored lights were moving and swirling, almost like an after image.  
i couldn't sleep for the longest time and the nest day i spoke to my partner to find out that they remembered the bands of moving light coming through the window and the experience, but not to the same extend (sounds, feelings, etc) that i did.
the was problems with the power the next day and hydro was  there the next day fixing equipment.
i was scared (traumatized) for the longest time about sleeping by windows and scared to tell children and adults that we are not safe luest they think i'm crazy.  one of my cats would no longer go upstairs.

years later on i developed cancer and had three pets that all died from forms of cancer.
content.summary: Moving bars of light in a rectangular shape that met and pulsuated toward the centre, light came towards us through the window when we were sleeping on the floor

content.detailedDescription:
It was october of 1977, i spent that friday skate bording with my friends earlier that day. i was 14, had gotten to bed around 11 pm. my bed was under the window, the curtain were closed, shortly after i had gotten to bed a very bright light was shining through the window and covered me and i could not move. i tried to move but could not. as i stated the curtains were closed. behind our was a wooded lot and the light came from over the treetops. it was not a helocopter because there was no sound other than the wind blowing and hearing the trees.

the next day i was scared but went to where our fort was and everything was still there, nothing missing. this has haunted me since then. my wife and kids (ages now 29 & 25) are the only ones who know about this.

i do recall people seeing strange things during that time (1977-80) because of the nuclear power plant in st. lucie county his was south of us. i hope that someone can help me make sense of this almost 38 years later. btw, patrick airfare base is north of us.

thank you and i hope to hear from you soon,
sincerely
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Bright light came through bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
The camera trap is set up 180 degrees mainly to watch my car and window .
had couple attempts  break in .The camera trap looks like it caught either
the sun blear of a u.F.O  that split you be the judge please contact me 
by cell thank you 
i really did not look at the time stamp and date it will tell you it at my place if this another ufo that's a 2nd time back in july i sent you a report july 2015 my wife and i  thank you
content.summary: From my cama trap  i have set up to watch my cars and its faceing the bedroom window  way do to people tring to break in

content.detailedDescription: I was at a house warming party on top of a mountainous ridge in rural tn. the view was tremendous. in the front lawn, it seemed like you could see forever in any direction due to the home being built on the highest local point. at approximately 10pm, i was admiring the view and looking up at the stars. i remember thinking how clear the sky was, and how that must be related to having no street lights in the area. i saw what i first thought to be a shooting star, as it appeared to be coming from....I don't know...The cosmos??? but it had to have been way way out into the depths of the abyss. i can remember how quickly it went from the size of a star to more like a nickel or quarter. it traveled in a direction that was toward the home, as if it were a meteor that would strike us. i actually flinched due to the speed at which it traveled. just as i started to flinch, it stopped and hovered perfectly still for what seemed like an eternity. in reality, however, it hovered for probably 8-10 seconds. i watched this thing appear to rotate silently. as it rotated, it pulsed blue, red and green in sequence. i saw that sequence at least 2-3 times. bare in mind, i'm looking upward... it then traveled from my 2 o'clock view to about 8 or 9 o'clock view so fast that my eyes could not fallow. i can only say that i saw it pass in my field of vision. sure, i tried to track it with eye/head movement, but it's was faster than my eyes could move. it did not accelerate. it went from hovering to full speed, instantly. i began to shout at the other guests at this time and ask if anyone else had seen this, and only one other gentleman had. i don't know his name. he was slim, dark-haired and about 20 yrs old. within about 2 mins, 2 darkly lit fighter jets came over and were heading in that direction. they were low and fast. i could hear the engines screaming and i know they had those things wide open....Had to because it "boomed" when they came over. within the next 2-3 mins, i saw a total of 4 more jets, 2 large 4 engine planes (like a c-130 maybe?) and finally 2 helicopters. now it was dark, so i'll give you that....But these things did not look like the planes i normally see. these were all darkly painted. had to be gray or black. some appeared to have no lights on. but they were all headed in the same direction as the "thing" i saw. i remember thinking "they will never be able to catch that thing".
content.summary: Maybe sphere. hard to tell, but it spun in a consistent circular motion while hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 2 am, upset because i thought i had missed the perseid meteor shower. i went outside to smoke, my husband came out to join me after washing our babys bottle. we were really enjoying the view because we dont live around a lot of light pollution. all of a sudden in the middle of the sky i see these lights in a v shape or boomerang form almost like an aircraft.And i kept yelling at my husband, do you see it? he said yes i see it. i told him keep looking at it don't loose it! it was headed south east and became less visible when it went into the horizon. it flew or hovered right over us and it was extremely quiet. we became very uneasy and are absolutely shocked! we both have never witnessed anything of this kind.
content.summary: 2am pacific time, lights, vshape, triangle, aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Every clear night they come and visit and interact with me!

come bring telescopes or high powered binoculars asap!

flashing white, red and blue lights!

red beam of light to ground transported 2 aliens to ground!

i had scares and 1 still not healed!

please hurry!

(7 witnesses)
content.summary: They began feb 15, 2015 and continue every clear night to this day above my home! visit me

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and noticed fort hood helicopters flying around and decided to video them as i fly scale rc helicopters and planes and i wanted to mimic how the real ones fly.I have been into aircraft for as long as i can remember.I even went after my own private pilot license.So when i seen this object and how the helicopter responded i knew it was no bird or bug flying threw the video! and judging by the scale size of the object it's at least the size of a black hawk helicopter and the incredible speed of it and lack of sound i knew i caught something of interest on video.So then i got enhanced video still shots of it and i was amazed that it in fact was very close to the helicopters.I have video of it on youtube it's under ufo almost collides with black hawk ft hood.
content.summary: Was videoing black hawks flying

content.detailedDescription:
1-. my self and my friends where at a ranch in potrero chico ,n.L,mexico, i was stading  by the side  of a  swimming  pool and  my  buddies went in to the  open field to take  pics of the stars, they suddenly  yield  at  me to come and  see  what they where  looking  at.  
2-. one  looking  starlike  started  moving down in to the earth very close  to the  ground and  it  hovered above a  tree and  realased  beams  of  light, green and  white  color. the hill shined and  we could  see the  rocks , trees  and bushed  from a distance  of 700 hundread feet. 
after that  a second star like  flew into the  mountain, a vertical 870 m big wall, where  there where no climbers at the  moment  and  no stablished routes to climb  on, this  light sigzaged, a 3rd  light  appeard in the very summit  of the  mountain, it was in the very edge  of the summit, the  light hide just  behind the summit  edge, so we  walked backwards to be able to see  it, we took 2-3 steps back,  then the light  was  hovering , again ,it  hide again. we backed backwards  again , and  we repeated the same pattern like 100 feet till the  light disappeared, seems  like the  light  wanted us to back backwards  to be able to see  it.
3-.I knew  it  was a  ufo for sure.And we all knew  it.Since it  not the first time  we see  ufos in that  place, this  time  there where  several objects  in the  nightsky  ,and  it  looked like  they where  waching the earth from their stationary points but  still hovering.
4.Some  lights flew around  the  mountain , realeased and  flashed  lights  in to it,  some  other  where  in very hight  altitude  just hovering  and relaesing  green and white beans into the sky. some  other just  vanished instantly.
5. i was exited and some  of my  friends where  kind  of scared but  i managed tp calm  them  down. i had a power full head lamp and  lighted  the  objets  that  where  in the  mountain and  not  too far  from us,  they lights seems to react to it  by flashing  their lights.
6-. they hight  altitude  lights spent  all night in the same spot  ,hovering and releasing  random  light  beams  green and  white  colors. some  light  where orange and red. the  observation took place  all night  till the dawn and the sunrise  started.
content.summary: Many starslike started changing directions in to a  mountain and some other kept it is  stationary positions releasing green  ,white beams  in to the  sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had put the kids to bed around 9:30.  we talked about the persiod meteor shower and decided around 10pm to go out on our back deck to see if we spot any metors that night.  we turned off the lights in our house and were looking north at the time not really spotting anything in particular.  i looked to the left (northwest) and say 6-7 sold red lights (light a led red lights). at first i thought it was airplanes or a fleet of helicopters.   i told my wife how strange they looked and she agreed and took our her i-phone to record.  we couldn't pickup the lights in the distance.  4 of the red lights moved away to the north and moved away from our location and the object.  at this time we saw three distinct red lights in a row.  the object made a right turn from where it was at.  at this time you could see the "back" of the object which had two blinking white lights with a red sold light in the middle.  although the object matched the night sky you could now tell that it was cigar shaped and cylindrical in shape.  it made no noise and again was hard to distinguish between the night sky and the object.  it banked to its right and moved at a slow speed to the south.  my wife and i agreed that this was no plane that was flying. we noticed that a neighbor walking her dogs didn't even turn her head despite these large lights flying around in the sky.  we live south and east of raleigh, so there are not really any commercial planes that fly over our house, and if there are, they are usually very high and you can distuguish what they are.  there is seymour johnson airbase in goldsboro and occasionally they fly f-15's around the area, but these are very easy to hear that they are jets.  this object did not move like an airplane and for it size there is no way its airspeed could of allowed for it to stay airborn.  the obeject eventually moved to the south and our of sight over the horizon.
content.summary: Multiple lights in the area, large cigar shaped with solid red lights

content.detailedDescription:
on june 6 2015, my wife and grandson saw 2 ufos at the park near our home.
she was able to photograph one of them. it is the same sixe and shape as the ufos i am now reporting.
   16 days ago, at around 9:00pm, i noticed a star that seemed to be unusually larger than a star and seemed to be flickering red, yellow, and green. i looked at it with a 50x power scope on my rifle and could clearly see the ufo.  it looked like a ferris wheel at the state fair. it had colored lights all around the rim and lights going from the rim to the center like you would cut a pie (green, red, yellow). the ufo was just hovering in one spot and was wobbling like a ship on the high seas. the next night there were 3 ufos, a few days later 5, a few days later 8, a few days later 13 around 9:30pm and then around 1:30 am i saw 25 ufos. all of them look just alike and are doing the same thing. they stay in one spot and hoover like they are waiting on something or someone. i have observed them for 12 out of the 16 days, cloud cover and rain in the other 4 days.
you cannot see them in the day time. the first ufo i observed seems to be the leader.  it shows up between 8:40 and 8:50pm and the others begin to show up 10 to 15 minutes later. they do not descend down but just suddenly appear as if they turn on their lights or just appear from the 4th dimension.  there seems to be some kind of organization among them, there are 4 groups with 3 ufos in each group and they form a semi circular pattern.  the others are randomly scattered.  i also observed a small sphere flying around 2 ufos.
content.summary: Saucer shape with lights around the rim and lightsgoing to center looked like a ferris wheel, as many as 28, have observed thm 12 out of last 16 days, still here , never move they just wobble in one place

content.detailedDescription:
I like the "black helicopter" part. shows you guys aren't too serious about this whole thing. "insect like"? come on, guys! lose the low-brow humor! this ain't 1957.
anyway, i was sitting at the drive-in (alone) movie waiting for it to start (burnt offerings" with karen black and oliver reed. the sun had recently set and the 2 vehicles had the sun reflecting off of them per orbiting satellites. otherwise, they couldn't have been seen. they went almost from horizon to horizon (left to right) and could have been manned aircraft but one dropped appx. 2 miles, in a split second, proceeded north then shot right back up as in dropping to check out something. i thought the "lights" may have been reflections inside my windshield so i stuck my head out the window to be sure. they passed behind the theater screen  so i looked around and nobody else appeared to have noticed them. they emerged from behind the screen and slowly flickered out as they lost the sun's reflection. took about 20 seconds to pass.
my estimated speed of them was around 3500+ mph. elevation maybe 8,000 feet. it was hard to tell being they could have been anywhere from 50 to 200 miles away. like i said, all i was seeing was the sun's reflections off the obviously shiny bottoms. my "feelings" during the sighting? "cool!"
content.summary: Sun reflecting off bottom of craft. no actuall vehicle sighting. too far away.

content.detailedDescription: my eyewitness account took place on september 23rd, of 1991... i was in the parking lot of my apartment complex, doing some stargazing in the early morning hours of september 23rd, 1991. it was around 1:27 am that morning. although there was no moon, the sky was clear, and the stars were brightly visible. i was observing a few stars to the north, as i began to focus my attention on one star in particular, it suddenly disappeared from my view. (it seemed like a light going out, when the switch is turned off). i was taken by surprise of course, then kinda jumped up feeling kind of bewildered, and at first thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, or maybe i lost focus of the star in particular. as my attention was turned to a couple more stars in the same area, i noticed again, that they seemed to just "go out like light bulbs", then i was really confused, but tried to strain my eyes, trying to see beyond the glare of the street light a few feet down, and across the street from me. as i watched, and searched for the cause of what happened to the stars, i then noticed a black, silhouette crossing the night sky. the dark figure, was crossing my path of vision, between the stars i had been looking at, and myself, of course, blocking the starlight from my view. i couldn't make out what i was looking at at first. the object moved slowly towards the south, and it wasn't until it turned right, towards the south west, that i could then make out its shape. it looked like a giant "v"-shaped craft. but not as narrow as a v, more like a spearhead, or arrowhead shape, with a notch cut-out at the rear base, between the two wing tips. it was huge! it was as large as a football stadium! it was black, no lights, no sounds, it seemed to just float across the sky, like a balloon, or blimp. not very fast at all, and i thought to myself, "how could something that large fly so slow, and not fall out of the sky?" i was, shocked, amazed, and a little afraid. it seemed to not want any attention brought on itself, as it had no lights or sound. as i said, it was a black silhouette, a shadow, but i just happened to see it by mere chance! i called out to neighbors, but no one came. i didn't want to run inside to call authorities, as this was something i didn't see everyday. so i just wanted to watch this thing in total amazement. since this experience, i've only told a few people, but after being laughed at, i stopped sharing my story, until now, and decided to make this report. i've researched many v shaped ufo stories, videos, and pictures online, but sadly, i haven't come across anything that resembles the one i had seen. i know what i saw, and after what i had seen, i know that craft wasn't man-made, nor that it was from this world. i want to know what is out there, and even if i don't like what i find, i'm compelled pursue and learn the truth. p.S. about a week after the sighting, i had a dream of the same craft, in my dream, it appeared to be hidden in clouds, and it exited the cloud mass, hovering over me...
content.summary: Large  triangular

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching for the meteor shower, when i saw 4 lights in the sky near the horizon about a quarter up in the sky. they were in two pairs and the same distance apart. they did not move and were not stars. they were in the northeast sky. i got out my binoculars and could see that they were fluttering, wobbling and emitting different colors of light, blinking. the one on the very far right had a smaller red light that was close to it. i observed them for approximately 15 minutes and they did not move that whole time.
content.summary: Outside watching for meteor shower. saw  4 stationary lights in pairs same distance apart. they all flashed different colors. one had a red light beside it. all 4 too low to be stars..

content.detailedDescription:
At about 1:15am on 8/13/15, i went outside to search the skies for some
 perseid meteors.  while looking at the northern skies, i noticed a bright light which i thought was an airplane.  i continued to look at this light but saw that it wasn't moving - it remained stationery.  while paying a bit more attention to this light, i noticed that reddish, bluish, yellowish, greenish and white lights were pulsating from this object.  i then went back to the house to get my binoculars to try to get a better look at this thing.  by the time i got back outside, the object was hidden by some clouds.

at about 1:20am the cloud had moved and the light reappeared and continued to pulsate the same colors seemingly in a random pattern.  this made me believe that the object was very high in the sky and couldn't be a plane, balloon, drone, kite, planet or meteor.  it never moved as far as i could tell but remained in its same location at all times.

i continued to watch this object which was about the same size as the visible stars in the area until about 1:30am when i went into the house to go to bed.  i would imagine the object remained in the sky in the same location after that.

i have been interested in astronomy for over 50 years and watch the skies every night in the hopes of viewing meteors, the space station or anything else.  i know what venus, jupiter, mars and saturn look like in the night sky.  i know i saw something last night but i don't know what i saw.  this morning i contacted several tv stations and my local police to find out if anyone had reported lights in the skies.  they told me nothing had been reported.
content.summary: Stationery object high in the sky w/ flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: Just happened to look up while picking up my girlfriend from her work and viewed what i could only describe as an orange blob. the overall size and speed of the object made me pay attention to it. in my opinion, no definitive shape or detail could be inferred simply from the speed the object was moving other than maybe an oval shape with obvious skewing in detail. i am not too familiar with the properties that would be associated with an object moving at such unreal speeds, but i wonder if maybe even the color could be different from the intense speed it was moving as well. i ended up stargazing with her after we got back home so that i could reassure myself that what i had seen was not a comet, but the funny thing was to me, the comets seemed to move slower than this object. not any grand difference of speeds probably because it was still viewable to my human eye, but seemingly faster, nonetheless. and there was extremely obvious differences. comets were small objects with tails at much greater distances away. the size of the object i viewed was enormous. i was not capable of viewing it for more than a few seconds, but it still imparted me with this feeling of awe that such a large object was able to move at such great speeds. if i were to give a very loose definition of length and width it honestly would not be that far off from the length and height of a vw beetle even though it seemed to be a great distance in the sky. i wish i could have viewed it longer to get a better idea of the size because i feel i really might have seen a "mothership" move at near warp speed or something along such parameters--once again, not an expert though. i was left honestly with a greater inner peace after viewing this because i had believed in ufo's and the existence of aliens before this, so it was just a nice confirmation for me. the only thing that could be scary for me as a logical thinker is that an object of such size could move at that speed. the object was not interested in me or anything in the area. i was just lucky enough to briefly view it.
content.summary: Giant orange blob moving at unreal speeds. viewing for more than the length of time i did would have been impossible without multiple observers.

content.detailedDescription: Last night while watching the meteor shower at about 1:10 a.M. i saw 2 brite white objects. if they had not been moving they would've been mistaken for stars. they were identical in every way, exact same size and brightness. put my arm out and with my thumb and index finger measured the distance between at 1 1/2 inches. they were very, very high maybe beyond earth's atmosphere so the true distance between them had to be huge and also their size. they were moving in perfect unison with each other, one was a few degrees lower than the other so they were at an angle. the speed was slow moving and coming downward but they stayed perfectly in line with each other and maintained the exact same distance from each other. it seemed as though they were connected, like they were just lights at opposite ends of a perfectly straight object. i watched them with my binoculars and i couldn't see anything connecting them but it was extremely dark last night so they could have been. they looked just like stars but they didn't flicker or sparkle and when i got my binoculars to look at them i saw that they both had a dark edge around them, like a black ring, they were encased in something. that to was identical to each other. they were moving from northwest toward northeast slowly at a downward angle, they came from very high were getting lower. they went behind a tree so i went down the street a ways and caught them again and watched until they disappeared behind the mountains in san jancinto. some one else watching the meteor shower must have seen them.
content.summary: 2 identical very bright objects, moving in perfect unison as if connected. one a few degrees lower, moving slowly at angle from very high downwards across horizon, seen thru binocs each had a dark outer edge, like encased.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the beach at the jersey shore near lavallette, nj.  it was 1:48 pm eastern time but my camera is set at cdt.  several people were looking up at the sky.  a full circular rainbow was around the sun.  it was quite beautiful.  no one had ever seen one before.  (i looked it up later...A sun halo caused by ice crystals in the atmosphere, i think.)  

we grabbed our cameras hoping to take a picture of the circular rainbow.  of course, it was difficult and we laughed about shooting directly at the sun.  with squinty eyes i took a series of 11 shots over a two minute, 6 second period.  glancing at my camera screen (so bright out), it was hard to see if i could 'capture the full rainbow' so i took the shots hoping to catch the bottom of it, the top of it, and hopefully a shot of the full circle.  it was quite random.  my friend and i discussed it...Figuring the shots wouldn't even turn out thinking the sunlight would glare over the pictures.  (my camera:  sony dsc rx100.  aperture: f/8. lens:  sony 28-100mm f1.8-4.9. focal length 10.4mm. shutter speed:  1/1250-1600.  flash did not flare...Auto mode. auto white balance. landscape mode, auto exposure.)

when we got back to the house, we pulled out our cameras...I noticed blue orbs on my pics and figured they were glares, camera lens dirt, reflections or whatever.  then, my friend said they were on his pictures as well.  initially, there was a bit of silence and disbelief--particularly because my pictures showed the orbs and 'blue light with a trail' in different locations between shots.  none of us saw anything when we took the pictures because, naturally, we couldn't look up directly at the sun.

when i came back to tulsa, i loaded the pictures onto my macbook pro.  i am fascinated by the blue lights.  then, i decided to adjust the pics to see if anything would become clearer or more distinct.  i adjusted (increased) the following:  contrast, black point, definition, highlights, shadows, saturation, vibrancy.  essentially, just 'pushed them to the limit' to see if anything would show up more clearly. 

that's when i became overwhelmed:  three distinct spots...One larger with a trail, one colored orb and another different colored orb.  in different locations between shots.  the contrail left by the jet that had flown by earlier gave us a reference point.  these photos just don't make any sense to me.  the 11 photos don't show any semblance of 'sequence' of movement...The orbs appear in different locations between the photos.  it's easy to determine the difference between the clouds present and the orbs. we can't figure out what they are.  just an anomaly?  something real?  light reflections?  sure would like to know more!

i have the original digital photos protected in their original form on my computer as well.  the photos i'm sending in are the enhanced versions that clearly show several orbs in different locations.  the pictures are in sequence of when they were taken.  number 18 is omitted because it was taken 5 seconds after number 17 and showed the same phenomenon...And i see i can only attach 10 photos.  ironically, photo number 15 is the only one i got with the 'full circle halo' and oddly, it's the only one without any orbs showing up.  number 22 is the most distinct.  

thank you.
content.summary: Pictures of a sun halo reveal orbs.

content.detailedDescription: Last night i was outside and noticed some flashing/twinkling lights in the sky. i watched for several minutes, then all of a sudden i actually saw the unthinkable....Wow/omg it appeared as clear as day; very large craft over the top of trees at the house hovering and not making a sound. then several small crafts appeared that started darting back & fourth as if something urgent was happening. i felt as if the crafts were in trouble or searching form something!!!! i got so scared that i started screaming for someone to take a look at the sky with me. my kids came running out of the house and they saw it too!!!! i don't know how to explain what i am feeling now---so overwhelmed, confused, anxious, mesmerized, about to have a nervous breakdown. can anyone help me deal with this because it is truly life changing!!!!!!!!!!!!! i just can't get my self together now; i asked myself; why did i see them/crafts?? will they come back?? what will people think of me when i tell them this story?? will anyone believe me?? how am i supposed to come to grips with the extraordinary event?? i need help.....Asap!!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several different size crafts, one big craft shaped like big bat or triangle, followed by several small crafts

content.detailedDescription: All i have is 10 second video from time lapse 30 second rate with 1:2.8 50mm lens over approx. 2 hours. first 1 second reveals image
content.summary: I was taking a time-lapse 2 hour video every 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I never make comments publicly ,but because of  this  i must. this semi-bright light that started to moved into a position that is supposed to be occupied by a star , but the star was not there ! then this lite or star moves into the missing stars  position . so now all the stars  look like they are  in their right positions . the north star is my favorite to find in sky its real easy to find .I use it and the big dipper and the clock method, 1,2,3,...North, east , south and west to look at the stars . i only smoke outside ! so i am outside a lot, years in fact . i know i live in a hot spot but this is the one that makes me say what? so i`ve just went outside and had just lit my smoke when i started looking at some star .Its  3 am. aug 13 2015 and this is supposed to be the best night for watching the meteor showers.Then one star starts to move not fast real slow so i`m watching it and it  gets brighter then dim not real noticeable unless your watching . then it just stops i start to look at the groups of stars that i know like the big dipper, north star, orion belt and all the pyramid patterns that i see .I know my patterns,but not the names of them . for over 10 years i have been looking from the same spot night after night and after that long you will notice something out of place not quite right or to bight. i will keep watching this part of the sky more intently . this was no sat, plane , balloon ,swamp gas , it was a perfectly clear night unlimited view , no clouds of any kind. my aunt who has retired from nasa told me back in the 60s wink
content.summary: Bright lite/star moves very short distance then stops,bright dim ... thenstationary dims

content.detailedDescription: Watching the meteors on a rooftop appeared a star, out of nowhere as bright as aldebaran began flashing, 3 second intervals, that gradually increased into about 5 or 7 seconds and stopped after about 16 seconds.
content.summary: On the final night of the perseids meteor showers, a flashing star-like dot appeared east, near what i believe to be aldebaran.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the waterfront in toronto watching the perseids, only saw about 2 dozen. i was lying on the ground had been there about an hour and a half. then i saw what i thought was another meteor i tracked it and it seemed to move in a zigzag perhaps even changing speed. most meteors appear, increase in brightness and then quickly fade to black. this thing didn't do that. it just kept moving towards the east or north east, didn't increase in brightness, it was exactly like a satellite, but didn't move in a steady uniform motion. i've seen satellites before this thing didn't match what i've seen. after a few seconds i knew this was not a meteor or a satellite, i'm fairly certain it was something else. its brightness faded after 30 - 45 seconds.
content.summary: Apeared at first to be a meteor but it did not appear as the other meteors i saw, peculiar movement

content.detailedDescription: Quincy california, sitting outside on our deck. a friend brought to my attention something strange was happening in the sky. i've never seen anything like it. i though maybe it was a satelite at first, but then i realized it was moving way too fast and it was a much brighter light. while we watched the amber sphere move across the sky a blinking light (aircraft) came up on it very swiftly and closed the gap within a minute or so. it also seemed as though the amber craft got closer to the ground as all of us could see multiple lights in it .Both the light and aircraft continued across the sky until we could no longer see them.
content.summary: Bright amber sphere moving across sky, followed by blinking american aircraft. straight path, continuously  became larger.  blinking light seems to intercept amber light.

content.detailedDescription: Setting in living room approximately 11:00 pm, when heard helicopters  hovering outside.  i went outside and  observed 5 helicopters in the sky,  3 of the helicopters very just hovering while the other two were moving around.  these were not police helicopters because they had no spot light on as if looking for someone.  the three that were hovering were very dim lighted, no flashing light  at all while the other two had red blinking lights. the three were spaced out several hundred yards apart not moving.  these copters were not real, real loud  despite the fact that there were five of them.  i waited to see what was going on because i never witnessed copters like this just hovering, while the other two seem to be looking for something in the sky not using spotlights.  then i seen a white light coming from the se direction.  this white light  started coming toward the copters, the three idled copters seem to finally start to moved away from the object as it came by,  one copter that was over my head that was hovering kind of started moving around the object as it was passing (i have this on video on my phone).  the object continued to move,  then copters backed off,  it went over my house almost in the same flight pattern as the jets fly, but then made a u-turn and started heading back the same way it came  except in a ne direction.  then it disappeared.  by the. the five helicopters had left.
content.summary: White object coming across nite sky while 5 helicopters observed its movement

content.detailedDescription: I was witnessing the meteor shower with friends around 10pm. i noticed a very distant and flickering light moving fast my across the sky. it was so faint at first i knew it was not a plane, also it was steady and consistant with its direction, not like a meteor. it then made a quick zig zag and disappeared. it then reappeared with a 2nd object. these 2 object got very close to one another and continued to hover in that spot, still flickering for over an hour. about 30 min later several other objects looking identical to the first appeared. they came together then spead apart to for a perfect line with exact distance between them. the center object was flashing a reddish light. all of the stayed hovering but almost in a circular motion. they all had flickering lights. there was also a whitish light that would flash occasionally to the left of the center object.  it was unbelievable to witness.
content.summary: I also witnessed this exact sighting from nj around 10pm. there is no logical explanation to what this could have been other than another life form. the way it moved through the sky and disappears than reappeared was unbelievable.

content.detailedDescription: I was semi conscious when i saw lights in my bedroom window. i looked out my window into my large backyard when i saw a chrome metallic disc over 60 feet wide in a circle shape. it later left an indent and drying of grass where it landed. suddenly i couldn't move and heard a high pitched screech and heard in my mind chattering and clicking, when i then saw 2 large grey aliens with huge eyes walking toward me. i then passed out. i awoke with 10 or more aliens around me and an incision on my arm when i blacked out again. i then awoke with a painful arm, head, and groin, my arm had a faint scar. i suddenly saw lights and went outside to see the ufo hover then fly east, north, then out of sight in 2 seconds it was gone. i took a photo of it flying away and a sketch of both the medical room, my room, and the landed ufo. my family friends, and pd think i'm an insane person. please help me. p.S.A magnet will stick to the arm with a scar and i used a chip detector and it was positive.
content.summary: In bed, couldn't move saw lights in windows 2 tall aliens in doorway then blacked out woke up with pain on arm from a chip.
